dialogues.Pitch: Ohhhh, I thought I heard the clippity-clop of a unicorn. What an adorable dream!   And look. At. Her. Precious child. So sweet, so full of hope and wonder. Why, there's only one thing missing...a touch of fear.  Hahaha! That never gets old!  Feel your fear. Come on. Come on, that's right.  Yesss. What a pretty little Nightmare. description: When an evil spirit known as Pitch lays down the gauntlet to take over the world, the immortal Guardians must join forces for the first time to protect the hopes, beliefs, and imaginations of children all over the world.—DreamWorks Animation
name: Rise of the Guardians
